verses.verse: (Blessed Unity of the People of God) A Song of Ascents. Of David. [1] Behold, how good and how pleasant it is For (Job 8:22; Ps. 35:26) brethren to dwell together in unity!
It is like the precious oil upon the head, Running down on the beard, The beard of Aaron, Running down on the edge of his garments.
It is like the dew of (Gen. 13:8; Heb. 13:1) Hermon, Descending upon the mountains of Zion; For (Deut. 4:48) there the LORD commanded the blessingâ€” Life forevermore.
